img.alt: Red Cross Blood Drive Comes to First United Methodist Church on April 30th

h3.a: Red Cross Blood Drive Comes to First United Methodist Church on April 30th

div.p: On Thursday, April 30th, from 1 pm to 6 pm, First United Methodist Church in Pana will be sponsoring an American Red Cross blood drive. In connection with this year's group of 2020 seniors, the...
Announcements are late but there is a surprise......!!!
Please read the latest information from Superintendent Bauer regarding the extension of School Closures in the State of Illinois.

Reminder concerning the April 30th Blood Drive at the First United Methodist Church: Anyone over 16 years of age can donate with their guardian's permission. Form can be found here: https://5il.co/fnrt
Attention PHS Athletes: Please take notice of the following message concerning sports and eligibility requirements.
Good morning! Today's Parent Guide focuses on Roblox: What is this gaming platform? How do you stay safe? How do you restrict social media/communication features?
